title: How Iran chooses its supreme leader, and who could be next?
summary_full: Ayatollah Khamenei's death following the joint U.S.-Israeli airstrikes has compelled country's leadership to confront the task of selecting a new supreme leader.
summary_public: Ayatollah Khamenei's death following the joint U.S.-Israeli airstrikes has compelled country's leadership to confront the task of selecting a new supreme leader.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: joint U.S.-Israeli airstrikes has compelled country's leadership

IR.label: neutral
IR.evidence: How Iran chooses its supreme leader, and who could be next?
